column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Even though I was enthralled
column2: my tummy rumbled and I hit the Garden Caf√©. Many options looked delish
column3: but I chose the Hummus Plate and ate a Snickers. After I finished my exquisite meal
column4: I hit the first floor and Gift Shop. I bought many cards and one book. I'm seriously compelled to buy a membership to the Institute.
